**applyPCmask** (ImageEM class method) |subTitle| Returns a re-calculated image with a phase contrast mask in the objective lens. |/subTitle|
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

.. include:: /classes/ImageEM/methods/applyPCmask.rst
